revised_title: Further Evidence of the Affinities of the Extinct Marsupial Quadruped Thylacoleo carnifex
tldr: The author examines the mandibular and dental structures of the extinct marsupial Thylacoleo carnifex, providing additional evidence of its affinities and carnivorous adaptations. The study compares the fossil with existing marsupial and placental carnivores, highlighting the unique features of Thylacoleo's jaw and teeth.
